summary: This release brings some important behind-the-scenes upgrades to keep Grove running smoothly and securely. We've added resilience and rate limiting to our Open Graph image service, made several fixes to improve authentication and error messaging, and updated some branding references to reflect our growing community. It's all about strengthening our foundation while keeping your blogging experience reliable and welcoming.

features: add resilience, observability, and rate limiting
fixes: update help article slugs in features card
improve token decryption error messages in Timeline
use JSON POST for Better Auth social sign-in
